customer_reviews.title: Great Product

product_meta.title: Airtight Cold Brew Iced Coffee Maker and Tea Infuser with Spout | Brocca by Bassani | 1.0L / 32oz Glass Carafe with Stainless Steel Removable and Reusable Filter
product_meta.description: Product Description: Bassani’s Airtight Brocca is the brand’s newest line of Cold Brew Coffee Makers that provides the ultimate brewing experience. Whether you are looking to enjoy a perfect Iced Coffee or a delicious Tea that fits your mood, the Brocca by Bassani will be your “go to” pitcher to satisfy all your beverage needs. Bassani’s Cold Brew Coffee Maker delivers a perfectly balanced and smooth cold brew coffee, while offering a sleek and elegant design that compliments any home’s decor. It can also be left inside the fridge or on the counter top without taking up too much space. During the brewing process, coffee grounds are steeped in room temperature or cold water for 12-24 hours, producing a strong and delicious coffee concentrate (or ready-to-drink coffee) that can be kept fresh up to 14 days. The removable stainless steel filter basket is designed for an easy cleanup and to allow the lid to continue covering the pitcher and guarantying the freshness of your brew. The Brocca is versatile, durable and infinitely practical, please join the Bassani experience and enjoy a refreshing and smooth cup of coffee with our newest line of Cold Brew Coffee Makers. Packaging Includes: 1 Airtight Cold Brew Coffee Maker (1.0L / 32oz.) 1 User Manual Instructions of Use: Please refer to User Manual Care Instructions Included Dishwasher Safe
feature_bullets: AMAZINGLY VERSATILE: Save up space and money! The Brocca can be used as a Cold Brew Coffee Maker, Tea Infuser or to make Fruit Infused Water. It can also serve as a premium, elegant pitcher for your favorite beverages, the best four-in-one deal ever!

AIRTIGHT SEAL THAT LOCKS IN FRESHNESS AND FLAVOR: Lock in freshness and flavor for up to two weeks thanks to our Bassani Brocca's BPA-Free silicon airtight seal! Your coffee will have a wonderful, delicious, smooth taste, no paper filters required!

PERFECT FOR COLD BREW AND BOTH ICED & HOT TEA: Bassani's Brocca is also perfect for brewing both iced & hot tea. It's simple, easy and works great with loose-leaf tea or tea bags. Its wide opening allows you to use it as a traditional teapot!

ULTRA-FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: 1.0L / 32oz / 4 coffee servings capacity, large pouring spout for easy serving, dishwasher safe, measurement label, a fine mesh 18/8 stainless steel filter, convenient access handle & BPA-free silicon seal. LIFETIME MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE: At Bassani, our customers' complete satisfaction is our ultimate goal, that is why we offer a Risk-Free Purchase.
